job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Science or related field

jd: From: Narsimha Kathi, iTech US narsimha.k@itechus.net Reply to: narsimha.k@itechus.net Hi , We have a job opportunity for you, please find the below details and let me know your interest ASAP. Role: Java Full Stack Developer (More in Backend)Location: Cary, NC Duration: Long Term Contract Responsibilities: As a Lead Software Engineer, you will be a full-stack developer on a fast-paced, Product-focused team building and deploying systems that are customer-first, leveraging modern, cloud technologies, cutting edge design and integrations across the entire software stack.You will have an opportunity to impact every part of the system, foster and cultivate your curiosity and iterate over solutions to be the very best you can be to deliver for our customers. Key Responsibilities: Analyzing, designing, and driving solutions for major components and featuresImplementing enterprise caliber web, mobile and backend solutionsEnsuring secure, high code quality across the entire teamInterfacing with key stakeholders and business leadersWorking with cross-functional teams for deliveryMentoring Mid/Junior Software EngineersRequired: Strong hands-on experience with web technologies like NodeJS, Groovy, Java/Jscript, ReactJS, Remix, Java, Springboot, Microservices API Development Ability to build, deliver and operate complex, cloud-based systemsProficiency with various database technologies and solutions, including both SQL and NoSQL (MongoDB preferred))8+ years’ experience in Software Development and strong technical experience with building enterprise scale distributed web and mobile applications.Proven CI/CD Agile, DevOps/Lean experience to ensure that solution adapts to digital platform ecosystemExcellent verbal and written communication skills with focused attention to details, as well as, demonstrated professionalism and time/task management skills; ability to establish strong relationships.Strong Software Development Life Cycle knowledge and experience, or comparable methodologiesBachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Science or related fieldStrong problem-solving skills with demonstrated ability to apply analysis to actionable insightsCross functional leadership: organize, motivate and lead those outside of the team Preferred:Skills using application logging and monitoring tools like AppD/SplunkExperience with Adobe analytics and content management and/or omni-channel technologiesBackground working in Financial Services, Insurance, and/or BankingSystems analyst skills and technical background to support review of technical proposals for IT projects and systemsSUBMISSION DETAILSLinkedIn: Consultant Name: Current Location: Relocation (Yes/No): Highest Qualification: Year/College/University: Passport number: Thanks & Regards Narsimha KathiiTechUS, IncDirect: 802-735-0270Phone: 802-383-1500 Ext 141
